original_title: The Making of "I Miss Sonia Henie"
overview: Karpo Acimovic-Godina's short documentary that follows the production of single room omnibus film I Miss Sonia Henie. Features footage of Godina, Dušan Makavejev, Tinto Brass, Bogdan Tirnanić, Mladomir “Puriša” Ðorđević, Paul Morrissey, and Frederick Wiseman.
title: The Making of "I Miss Sonia Henie"
